00025         Point Sphere::Sample(float u1, float u2, Normal *ns) const {
00026                 Point p = Point(0,0,0) + radius *
00027                         UniformSampleSphere(u1, u2);
00028                 *ns = Normalize(ObjectToWorld(Normal(p.x, p.y, p.z)));
00029                 if (reverseOrientation) *ns *= -1.f;
00030                 return ObjectToWorld(p);
00031         }
00032         Point Sphere::Sample(const Point &p,
00033                         float u1, float u2, Normal *ns) const {
00034                 // Compute coordinate system for sphere sampling
00035                 Point Pcenter = ObjectToWorld(Point(0,0,0));
00036                 Vector wc = Normalize(Pcenter - p);
00037                 Vector wcX, wcY;
00038                 CoordinateSystem(wc, &wcX, &wcY);
00039                 // Sample uniformly on sphere if \pt is inside it
00040                 if (DistanceSquared(p, Pcenter) - radius*radius < 1e-4f)
00041                         return Sample(u1, u2, ns);
00042                 // Sample sphere uniformly inside subtended cone
00043                 float cosThetaMax = sqrtf(max(0.f, 1.f - radius*radius /
00044                         DistanceSquared(p, Pcenter)));
00045                 DifferentialGeometry dgSphere;
00046                 float thit;
00047                 Point ps;
00048                 Ray r(p,
00049                       UniformSampleCone(u1, u2, cosThetaMax, wcX, wcY, wc));
00050                 if (!Intersect(r, &thit, &dgSphere)) {
00051                         ps = Pcenter - radius * wc;
00052                 } else {
00053                         ps = r(thit);
00054                 }
00055                 *ns = Normal(Normalize(ps - Pcenter));
00056                 if (reverseOrientation) *ns *= -1.f;
00057                 return ps;
00058         }
00059         float Sphere::Pdf(const Point &p, const Vector &wi) const {
00060                 Point Pcenter = ObjectToWorld(Point(0,0,0));
00061                 // Return uniform weight if point inside sphere
00062                 if (DistanceSquared(p, Pcenter) - radius*radius < 1e-4f)
00063                         return Shape::Pdf(p, wi);
00064                 // Compute general sphere weight
00065                 float cosThetaMax = sqrtf(max(0.f, 1.f - radius*radius /
00066                         DistanceSquared(p, Pcenter)));
00067                 return UniformConePdf(cosThetaMax);
00068         }
00069 private:

00074         float thetaMin, thetaMax;

00077 Sphere::Sphere(const Transform &o2w, bool ro, float rad,
00078                float z0, float z1, float pm)
00079         : Shape(o2w, ro) {
00080         radius = rad;
00081         zmin = Clamp(min(z0, z1), -radius, radius);
00082         zmax = Clamp(max(z0, z1), -radius, radius);
00083         thetaMin = acosf(Clamp(zmin/radius, -1.f, 1.f));
00084         thetaMax = acosf(Clamp(zmax/radius, -1.f, 1.f));
00085         phiMax = Radians(Clamp(pm, 0.0f, 360.0f));
00086 }
00087 BBox Sphere::ObjectBound() const {
00088         return BBox(Point(-radius, -radius, zmin),
00089                 Point(radius,  radius, zmax));

00091 bool Sphere::Intersect(const Ray &r, float *tHit,
00092                 DifferentialGeometry *dg) const {
00093         float phi;
00094         Point phit;
00095         // Transform _Ray_ to object space
00096         Ray ray;
00097         WorldToObject(r, &ray);
00098         // Compute quadratic sphere coefficients
00099         float A = ray.d.x*ray.d.x + ray.d.y*ray.d.y +
00100                   ray.d.z*ray.d.z;
00101         float B = 2 * (ray.d.x*ray.o.x + ray.d.y*ray.o.y +
00102                                    ray.d.z*ray.o.z);
00103         float C = ray.o.x*ray.o.x + ray.o.y*ray.o.y +
00104                           ray.o.z*ray.o.z - radius*radius;
00105         // Solve quadratic equation for _t_ values
00106         float t0, t1;
00107         if (!Quadratic(A, B, C, &t0, &t1))
00108                 return false;
00109         // Compute intersection distance along ray
00110         if (t0 > ray.maxt || t1 < ray.mint)
00111                 return false;
00112         float thit = t0;
00113         if (t0 < ray.mint) {
00114                 thit = t1;
00115                 if (thit > ray.maxt) return false;
00116         }
00117         // Compute sphere hit position and $\phi$
00118         phit = ray(thit);
00119         phi = atan2f(phit.y, phit.x);
00120         if (phi < 0.) phi += 2.f*M_PI;
00121         // Test sphere intersection against clipping parameters
00122         if (phit.z < zmin || phit.z > zmax || phi > phiMax) {
00123                 if (thit == t1) return false;
00124                 if (t1 > ray.maxt) return false;
00125                 thit = t1;
00126                 // Compute sphere hit position and $\phi$
00127                 phit = ray(thit);
00128                 phi = atan2f(phit.y, phit.x);
00129                 if (phi < 0.) phi += 2.f*M_PI;
00130                 if (phit.z < zmin || phit.z > zmax || phi > phiMax)
00131                         return false;
00132         }
00133         // Find parametric representation of sphere hit
00134         float u = phi / phiMax;
00135         float theta = acosf(phit.z / radius);
00136         float v = (theta - thetaMin) / (thetaMax - thetaMin);
00137         // Compute sphere \dpdu and \dpdv
00138         float cosphi, sinphi;
00139         Vector dpdu, dpdv;
00140         float zradius = sqrtf(phit.x*phit.x + phit.y*phit.y);
00141         if (zradius == 0)
00142         {
00143                 // Handle hit at degenerate parameterization point
00144                 cosphi = 0;
00145                 sinphi = 1;
00146                 dpdv = (thetaMax-thetaMin) *
00147                         Vector(phit.z * cosphi, phit.z * sinphi,
00148                                 -radius * sinf(theta));
00149                 Vector norm = Vector(phit);
00150                 dpdu = Cross(dpdv, norm);
00151         }
00152         else
00153         {
00154                 float invzradius = 1.f / zradius;
00155                 cosphi = phit.x * invzradius;
00156                 sinphi = phit.y * invzradius;
00157                 dpdu = Vector(-phiMax * phit.y, phiMax * phit.x, 0);
00158                 dpdv = (thetaMax-thetaMin) *
00159                         Vector(phit.z * cosphi, phit.z * sinphi,
00160                                 -radius * sinf(theta));
00161         }
00162         // Compute sphere \dndu and \dndv
00163         Vector d2Pduu = -phiMax * phiMax * Vector(phit.x,phit.y,0);
00164         Vector d2Pduv = (thetaMax - thetaMin) *
00165                          phit.z * phiMax *
00166                          Vector(-sinphi, cosphi, 0.);
00167         Vector d2Pdvv = -(thetaMax - thetaMin) *
00168                          (thetaMax - thetaMin) *
00169                          Vector(phit.x, phit.y, phit.z);
00170         // Compute coefficients for fundamental forms
00171         float E = Dot(dpdu, dpdu);
00172         float F = Dot(dpdu, dpdv);
00173         float G = Dot(dpdv, dpdv);
00174         Vector N = Normalize(Cross(dpdu, dpdv));
00175         float e = Dot(N, d2Pduu);
00176         float f = Dot(N, d2Pduv);
00177         float g = Dot(N, d2Pdvv);
00178         // Compute \dndu and \dndv from fundamental form coefficients
00179         float invEGF2 = 1.f / (E*G - F*F);
00180         Vector dndu = (f*F - e*G) * invEGF2 * dpdu +
00181                 (e*F - f*E) * invEGF2 * dpdv;
00182         Vector dndv = (g*F - f*G) * invEGF2 * dpdu +
00183                 (f*F - g*E) * invEGF2 * dpdv;
00184         // Initialize _DifferentialGeometry_ from parametric information
00185         *dg = DifferentialGeometry(ObjectToWorld(phit),
00186                                    ObjectToWorld(dpdu),
00187                                                            ObjectToWorld(dpdv),
00188                                    ObjectToWorld(dndu),
00189                                                            ObjectToWorld(dndv),
00190                                    u, v, this);
00191         // Update _tHit_ for quadric intersection
00192         *tHit = thit;
00193         return true;
00194 }

00238 float Sphere::Area() const {
00239         return phiMax * radius * (zmax-zmin);
